item.title: The crazy date/time formatting in Go
item.description: Formatting and parsing date/time strings is a very common use-case in programming. A lot of the programming languages I worked with take the same approach for that: Using the Unicode time pattern syntax UTS #35. For me it is always hard to remember the details, especially when it comes to the upper and lower case codes.
